Description: LSOA (2021) Codes for England and Wales, Data Zones (2022) for Scotland, and Super Data Zones (2021) for Northern Ireland

The coefficient of variation (CV) of the NDVI

(FINAL_PXL_COUNT / PXL_COUNT) * 100; Percentage of pixels removed as noise
